place.name: PEN Y CAE
place.gazetteerText: Pen-y-Cae, eccl. dist. and vil., Ruabon par., Denbighshire - dist., pop. 2785; vil., 2 miles from Ruabon sta.; P.O. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
